channel.title: Disguise doesn't work on apostle?
channel.description:
#### What happened?
Was scorned. Disguised apostle as possessor N1. Showed up as apostle when executed.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Apostle showing up as possessor when he got executed.
#### Steps to reproduce:
Disguise apostle (#14) as possessor when playing as Scorned(#5) on N1 ? I don't know if it's a random bug, but it lost me the game pretty quick.
#### Comments:

item.title: Disguise doesn't work on apostle?
